TextView.android:text: There will be separate papers for separate exams

Thousands of meritorious aspirants of Higher education Institutes and Government jobs are unable to take institutional guidance for these exams due to unfavourable economic conditions. We, at Scholademy, have a strong belief in access to quality education for all. Hence, to nurture the talent of such candidates, Scholademy will provide scholarship upto 100% in tuition fee in coaching for various competitive entrance and job examinations like IIT JEE, NEET, UPSC CSE, IES, GATE, CLAT, UGC NET, Judiciary, State PCS, SSC CGL, etc.
